summary: Senior SE Business Development Manager with extensive national account management experience and a proven track record in sales growth, cross-cultural sales, and marketing collaboration. Six Sigma Green Belt certified with strong leadership and program development skills.

experience.title: Technical Sales Representative
experience.description: Primary responsibilities were large industrial plants and A&E Firms. Customer base included EI DuPont, Hoechst Celanese, Fluor Daniels, Day & Zimmerman, Chemtex International, Bechtel Engineering, CRS-Sirrine, etc. Developed anti-surge control valve specifications for PET charge vessel and increased territorial sales; expanded market reach and profitability.

experience.title: Technical Sales Representative
experience.description: Primary responsibilities were large industrial plants and A&E Firms. Customer base included EI DuPont, Hoechst Celanese, Fluor Daniels, Day & Zimmerman, Chemtex International, Bechtel Engineering, CRS-Sirrine, etc. Increased territorial sales by approximately 45% annually and led top sales and profits for four years; developed and expanded territorial accounts.

experience.title: Sales Manager
experience.description: Liaison between multiple valve manufacturers and representative firms. Led initiatives to develop and troubleshoot digital products and software; managed strategic alliances and implemented training and marketing plans for regional territories.

experience.title: Senior Manager
experience.description: Managed Application Engineering Department responsible for product evaluation and sales implementation at customer sites. Negotiated contract with EI DuPont resulting in first-year sales of 26MM and provided technical services to three plant locations. Led IT initiatives for e2bSM (Engineering-2-Business) platform and oversaw organizational structuring and staffing.

experience.title: Business Development Manager
experience.description: Business development for strategic manufacturer alliances and for end users. Developed marketing presentations for end users (Chemical, Power, Pulp & Paper, etc.). Provided technical and marketing training for the sales department for Masoneilan & Yokogawa equipment.

experience.title: Technical Sales Leader
experience.description: Process Control Equipment business development for strategic manufacturer alliances. Primary interface with Manufacturers for Gexpro Services. Evaluated manufacturers' capabilities and capacity; contributed to GE Energy initiatives and MSDS packaging procedures; developed LMS 100 VBV and anti-icing valve systems; led sales projections and marketing initiatives for GE Energy.

experience.title: Strategic Automation Manager
experience.description: Responsible for automation shop design and setup. Wrote SOPs for automation quotations, manufacturing and testing. Delivered engineering presentations & specifications for manual and automated valves to engineering firms; led automation-related business development for turbine OEMs including General Electric, Siemens, Alstom and Mitsubishi.

experience.title: SE Technical Outside Sales Representative
experience.description: Technical support for Outside Sales Representatives in Southeast. Delivered engineering presentations & specifications for valves to engineering firms (e.g., Fluor, Mustang, CH2M Hill, D&Z, Hargrove, CHEMTEX); pursued turbine OEM business with General Electric, Siemens, Alstom and Mitsubishi.

experience.title: SE Business Development Manager
experience.description: Responsible for Own Brand business development in the southeast U.S., including NC, SC, GA, FL, AL, VA, MS, WV, KY, and TN. Supported Lewis-Goetz, Rawson, and ICD offices and sales reps to pursue opportunities for Own Brand products including ECON, Diamond Gear, C&C, Force, and Smith valves.
